comment: O for Christ's sakes, I'm supposed to throw Dr. Peterson under the conservative-intellectual-bus because he wrote a foolish tweet once? Thanks, but no thanks, Mr. Cullen. I'll look at his entire body of work, & judge him accordingly .... just as I'll judge your entire body of work, & likely find you innocent, even if I think you someday write or say something dumb.
